settings.content:
Our Story

Harbour & Field was born on the waterfront of Auckland with a simple mission: to craft premium menswear that combines refined style with everyday comfort. We source the finest cotton and linen, work with skilled artisans, and create modern classics built to last. Our pieces are designed for the modern professional who values quality, simplicity, and authenticity.

Our Mission

We believe in breathable fabrics, ethical sourcing, and timeless designs. Our commitment to quality craftsmanship and responsible manufacturing is at the heart of everything we do.

Our Values

  • Quality: Only premium fabrics and expert tailoring.
  • Sustainability: Long-lasting garments and responsible sourcing.
  • Customer Care: Personalised support via our contact form and FAQ.
